snippet: The Rangers were fresh at practice on Friday after a day of rest to recover from their triple-overtime win over the Capitals.
abstract: New York Rangers look fresh at practice after a day of rest to recover from their triple-overtime win over the Washington Capitals in Game 3 of their playoff series.
lead_paragraph: The Rangers were fresh at practice on Friday after a day of rest to recover from their triple-overtime win over the Capitals.

headline.seo: Rangers Recharge Batteries After Draining Game
headline.main: A Day Off Recharges the Weary Rangers
headline.print_headline: A Day Off Recharges The Weary Rangers
